titles.title: A bill to amend section 376 of title 28, United States Code, to allow cost-of-living adjustments in judicial survivors annuities, and to increase existing annuities by 10 percent.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 9/29/1987--Introduced. Amends the Federal judicial code to: (1) allow cost-of-living adjustments in judicial survivors' annuities (adjustments are currently based upon increases in judicial salaries); and (2) increase existing annuities by ten percent.
